metadata.title: CVE-2024-46751 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: don't BUG_ON() when 0 reference count at btrfs_lookup_extent_info()Instead of doing a BUG_ON() handle the error by returning -EUCLEAN,aborting the transaction and logging an error message.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
